title: Test an HRIS Update
description: The HRIS vendor has released a new patch. An admin needs to test it in the sandbox environment before deploying to production.

tasks.description: Apply the new patch to the HRIS sandbox environment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Admin successfully installs the patch in the test system.

tasks.description: Execute a standard test script that covers key HR processes (e.g., hire, terminate, promote).
tasks.expected_outcome: Admin runs through the test cases to ensure core functionality is not broken.

tasks.description: Document the test results and, if successful, schedule the patch for deployment to the production environment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Admin confirms the patch is safe and schedules the production deployment for the next maintenance window.
